title: Describe Image — Line Chart 1
promptText: Describe the main trends shown in the chart.

title: Describe Image — Bar Chart 2
promptText: Summarize key differences between the categories.

title: Describe Image — Pie Chart 3
promptText: Explain the dominant segments and their proportions.

title: Describe Image — Map 4
promptText: Comment on regional differences highlighted on the map.

title: Describe Image — Process Diagram 5
promptText: Outline the steps in the process and their relationships.

title: Describe Image — Table 6
promptText: Identify the highest and lowest values and compare categories.

title: Describe Image — Scatter Plot 7
promptText: Discuss any correlations or outliers present in the data.

title: Describe Image — Timeline 8
promptText: Describe how the subject changes over time and key milestones.

title: Describe Image — Infographic 9
promptText: Summarize the main message and supporting statistics.

title: Describe Image — Line Chart 10
promptText: Explain the overall trend and any significant fluctuations.
